code: import{api}from"../apiClient";export var register=function register(body){return api.post("/account/register",body);};export var login=function login(body){return api.post("/account/login",body);};export var logout=function logout(){return api.post("/account/logout");};export var forgotPassword=function forgotPassword(email){return api.post("/account/forgot-password",{email:email});};export var changePassword=function changePassword(){return null;};export var resetPassword=function resetPassword(body){return api.post("/account/reset-password",body);};
